contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|Kuybyshevsky District (disambiguation)}} [[File:Map of Russia - Kaluga Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Kaluga Oblast]] [[File:Map of Russia - Novosibirsk Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Novosibirsk Oblast]] [[File:Map of Russia - Rostov Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Rostov Oblast]] '''Kuybyshevsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]. The districts are generally named for [[Valerian Kuybyshev]], a Soviet statesman. ==Districts of the federal subjects== *[[Kuybyshevsky District, Kaluga Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="KalugaOCharter">{{RussiaBasicLawRef|klu}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="KalugaO_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|klu|mun|list3}}</ref> district of [[Kaluga Oblast]] *[[Kuybyshevsky District, Novosibirsk Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="NovosibirskOOKATO">{{OKATO reference|50 230}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="NovosibirskO_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|nvs|mun|list}}</ref> district of [[Novosibirsk Oblast]] *[[Kuybyshevsky District, Rostov Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="RostovO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ros|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="RostovOKuybyshevskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ros|mun|list|kuybyshevsky}}</ref> district of [[Rostov Oblast]] ==City divisions== *[[Kuybyshevsky City District, Irkutsk]], a city district of [[Irkutsk]],<ref name="IrkutskO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|irk|adm|law}}</ref> the administrative center of [[Irkutsk Oblast]] *[[Kuybyshevsky City District, Novokuznetsk]], a city district of [[Novokuznetsk]],<ref name="KemerovoO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kem|adm|list}}</ref> a city in [[Kemerovo Oblast]] *[[Kuybyshevsky City District, Samara]], a city district of [[Samara, Russia|Samara]],<ref name="SamaraCharter">{{RussiaBasicLawRef|sam|samara}}</ref> the administrative center of [[Samara Oblast]] <center> {{Location map+ |Russia |width=350 |float=right |alt=Cities in Russia with a city division called "Kuybyshevsky" |caption=Cities in Russia with a city division called "Kuybyshevsky" |places= {{Location map~|Russia|lat_deg=52|lat_min=18|lat_sec=44|lon_deg=104|lon_min=17|lon_sec=45|position=right|marksize=5|label=[[Irkutsk]]|background=#FFFFE9}} {{Location map~|Russia|lat_deg=53|lat_min=44|lat_sec=26|lon_deg=87|lon_min=06|lon_sec=48|position=top|marksize=5|label=[[Novokuznetsk]]|background=#FFFFE9}} {{Location map~|Russia|lat_deg=53|lat_min=15|lat_sec=41|lon_deg=50|lon_min=11|lon_sec=34|position=bottom|marksize=5|label=[[Samara, Russia|Samara]]|background=#FFFFE9}} }} </center> ==Renamed districts== *'''Kuybyshevsky District''', name of [[Spassky District, Republic of Tatarstan|Spassky District]] of the [[Republic of Tatarstan]], in 1935â€“1991 ==See also== *[[Kuybyshevsky (disambiguation)]]
